content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court has decided to dissolve a marriage and has awarded the applicant with a land plot a garden house and a vehicle there are creditor obligations involved in the case and the court will determine the division of joint property and liabilities the applicant has requested that certain property be awarded to them and that the defendant be held responsible for their personal debts the court will also consider the applicants claim for joint several obligations with creditors the court has granted the request for a divorce and ordered the division of matrimonial property the applicant will receive the property and a personal vehicle the text also mentions various creditors and their liabilities as well as the costs that the defendant has to pay
